src_original: 3/15 sarva ete sādhanadharmā yathāsvaṃ pramāṇaiḥ siddhasādhanadharmamātrānubandhe eva sādhyadharme 'vagantavyāḥ /
yathā mahānasādau /  asti ceha dhūma iti /
3/22 ihāpi siddhe eva kāryakāraṇabhāve kāraṇe sādhye kāryaheturvaktavyaḥ /
3/23 vaidharmyavataḥ prayogaḥ- yat sadupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptaṃ tadupalabhyata eva /  yathā nīlādiviśeṣaḥ /
